input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='King Ice 12mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry'
  - Name='King Ice Miami Cuban Chain Necklace'
  - Name='Wu-Tang Eternal Wu Chain'
  - Name='King Ice 8mm Miami Cuban Link Bracelet Hip Hop Bracelets'
  - Name='18k South Beach Cuban Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Onyx Beverly Pendant Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Women's Iced Out Cuban Link'
  - Name='King Ice 18mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry'
  - Name='King Ice 10mm Miami Cuban Curb Chain'
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Choker Chain in 14K Gold Plated'
  - Name='GLD Miami Cuban Link Necklace in 14K Rose Gold'
  - Name='GLD Miami Cuban Chain + Bracelet Bundle'
  - Name='JAXXON Figaro Essentials Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='The GLD Shop Miami Cuban Link Bracelet 8mm Size'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 2mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Women's Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 4mm Round Box'
  - Name='JAXXON 2mm Solid Gold Rope Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 12mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Miami Cuban link chain similar in style to the reference, though thicker at 12mm and possibly different material, so highly relevant but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice Miami Cuban Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Miami Cuban necklace indicating similar construction and function but lacks thickness/gauge detail, suggesting close but not exact match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Wu-Tang Eternal Wu Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a themed pendant chain not specifically a Cuban link, so less relevant to the Cuban link reference chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 8mm Miami Cuban Link Bracelet Hip Hop Bracelets
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Has the same 8mm Cuban link style like the reference, but it is a bracelet not a necklace, so partially relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 18k South Beach Cuban Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Cuban chain similar in style and presumably function, but material is 18k which differs from stainless steel gold plating in the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Onyx Beverly Pendant Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While from the same brand JAXXON and a chain, this includes a pendant and likely a different style than a plain Cuban link, making it less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm Women's Iced Out Cuban Link
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, 8mm gauge, and Cuban link design, but iced out style adds embellishment. Highly relevant and close to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 18mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Miami Cuban link chain like reference but heavier gauge at 18mm and possibly different for style preference; relevant but bulkier.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 10mm Miami Cuban Curb Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban curb/link chain style and a slightly larger gauge (10mm) making it highly relevant but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Miami Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic Miami Cuban link necklace implies very close style and function as reference with unspecified gauge and material; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Miami Cuban Link Choker Chain in 14K Gold Plated
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 14K gold plated Cuban link choker is very similar in material and style, with choker length as a minor difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GLD Miami Cuban Link Necklace in 14K Rose Gold
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Miami Cuban link in 14K rose gold differs in color and brand but otherwise similar construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GLD Miami Cuban Chain + Bracelet Bundle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes Cuban chain necklace similar to reference plus bracelet; relevant but a bundle with extra items.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Figaro Essentials Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Figaro chain is a different link style than Cuban link; less relevant despite same brand and chain type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and style with a slightly thicker 10mm gauge; very close to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link and iced out style but thinner 5mm and silver material differs from gold stainless steel; fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link chain similar in style but 10mm gauge and silver material rather than gold plated stainless steel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The GLD Shop Miami Cuban Link Bracelet 8mm Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same gauge and style but a bracelet instead of necklace, so only moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighter gauge and silver instead of gold plating, but still Cuban link and same brand making it somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 2mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain, 20"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same style and brand but much thinner at 2mm and different material (white gold versus gold plated stainless steel).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same iced out Cuban link style with silver and smaller gauge making it quite relevant though less close than 8mm gold.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Women's Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Cuban link, and gold color aligning closely with the reference except gender marketing; very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same style brand but smaller gauge 5mm chain set less similar in size and possibly composition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 4mm Round Box
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different chain style (round box), thinner gauge, and different silhouette than Cuban link chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 2mm Solid Gold Rope Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very different chain style (rope), smaller gauge 2mm, and solid gold rather than plated stainless steel; minimal relevance.
